page.title: 08KEIGHLEY MOSQUE
page.content: The Mosque was built on Emily Street so that the Muslims could have somewhere to worship, it will be 10 years old in September 1985. Between 30 and 70 people pray there each day, the special day is Friday. Muslim's God is Allah and Mohammed is his Prophet. They believe that reading the Quran helps them to lead a perfect life. As you enter the Mosque you must take off your shoes, cover your head and wash your hands, feet and face to show respect the House of Allah. The Mosque is different to our Church because it does not have seats, but a carpet, it has no organ and no eagle.The roof has a lot of decoration The Mosque does not do weddings like the Church.
